artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Iseya Kanekichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of an old man with white hair and beard, with end of beard tied with yellow cord; man has grimacing expression; yellow eyes; man wears garment with dark and light linear patterning and fabric with green ground and yellow and orange dragons; landscape behind figure with mountain in ULQ, trees and market stall with flowers and white and purple checkerboard roof in ULQ
inscription: 一ふしに　千代をこめたる　杖なれば　つくともつきじ　君がよはひは {Hitofushi ni / chiyo o kometaru / tsue nareba / tsuku to mo tsukiji / kimi ga yowai wa}
markings: date seal: 子十 {ne jū} (Rat 10) | censor seals: 福 {Fuku} | 村松 {Muramatsu} | publisher\'s seal: {Isekane} | carver\'s seal: 横川彫竹 {Yokogawa hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Visual Parody of the Thirty-Six Selected Poets (Mitate sanjūrokkasen no uchi 見立三十六歌撰之内)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Poem by Ōnakatomi Yorimoto: (Actor Ichikawa Ebizō V as) Kiichi Hōgen
